ground_truth_bugs.description: Async forEach pattern - remindersToUpdate.forEach(async...) doesn't await delete operations
NULL referenceId sent to SendGrid API in cron job - query doesn't filter out null referenceIds
immediateDelete=true path doesn't delete WorkflowReminder record from database

analysis_notes: Both droid and golden have 100% precision - all comments point to real bugs
Both miss one bug that the other caught - complementary coverage
Droid's comment on NULL referenceId is more specific (exact file/line)
Golden's async forEach comment is broader and covers multiple instances beyond what droid pointed to
The async forEach pattern actually exists in 7+ locations but droid only pointed to one specific instance
Golden's immediateDelete bug is a significant omission by droid - clear code path that doesn't clean up DB
